titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 3545) to provide for reconciliation pursuant to section 4 of the concurrent resolution on the budget for the fiscal year 1988.

action.text: House Committee on Rules Reported an Original Measure. Report No: 100-408.
Called up by House as Privileged Matter.
Failed of Passage in House by Yea-Nay Vote: 203 - 217 (Record Vote No: 385).

bill.summary: 10/28/1987--Introduced. Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 3545 (budget reconciliation).
